column4: Could not calculate the upgrade. An unresolved problem occured while calculating the upgrade: E:Error, pkgProblemResolver::Resolve generated breaks, this may be caused by held packages. Help?
are you uptodate with ubuntu-desktop installed?
Yup. Just checked to be fully sure.
I dunno, sorry.  Maybe the repo is still updating.
I'll try it once again I guess.
the cli may give a better message
did you get any other msgs?
I think there are logs in /var/logs/dist-upgrade
They seem to be pointing towards errors regarding xorg dependencies
are you sure you never installed an xorg ppa?
yeah, I think you need to purge that ppa, downgrade your xorg, unfortunately
Alright, I'll get on that then I suppose.
